name: qa-auto-infina-b2c-api
description: Automated API testing for B2C application using Newman/Postman

scripts.test:newman: newman run scripts/api-test-collection.json -e scripts/environment.json --reporters cli,json,html --reporter-json-export test-results/results.json --reporter-html-export test-results/report.html
scripts.docs: cp -r data/* docs/ && cp test-results/* docs/ 2>/dev/null || true

author: Diep Huynh
